resources.string: This app helps DJs manage their music metadata and keep personal notes on individual tracks. Our beautiful background image photo is by Ardian Lumi on Unsplash.

• Add to create your own records.
• Save your tracks (hosted by Firebase).
• Search to find a song in MusixMatch's database.
• Tap a result to add it to your collection.
• List the type of dance event, owned or wish list, BPM, songs to play with it.
• To delete: swipe on the home screen.
• Reorder how tracks display your home screen.
Didn\'t find what you were looking for? Try a more specific search. Results capped at 100.
